description.para: Compare active integer elements in the source vector with an immediate, and place the boolean results of the specified comparison in the corresponding elements of the destination predicate. Inactive elements in the destination predicate register are set to zero. Sets the First (N), None (Z), !Last (C) condition flags based on the predicate result, and the V flag to zero.

uses_dit.condition: FEAT_SVE2 is implemented or FEAT_SME is implemented

affected_by_sme.output: predicate register or NZCV condition flags

ps.name: CMPEQ-P.P.ZI-_

intro.para: Is the name of the destination scalable predicate register, encoded in the "Pd" field.

explanation.enclist: cmpeq_p_p_zi_, cmpge_p_p_zi_, cmpgt_p_p_zi_, cmphi_p_p_zi_, cmphs_p_p_zi_, cmple_p_p_zi_, cmplo_p_p_zi_, cmpls_p_p_zi_, cmplt_p_p_zi_, cmpne_p_p_zi_
cmpeq_p_p_zi_, cmpge_p_p_zi_, cmpgt_p_p_zi_, cmphi_p_p_zi_, cmphs_p_p_zi_, cmple_p_p_zi_, cmplo_p_p_zi_, cmpls_p_p_zi_, cmplt_p_p_zi_, cmpne_p_p_zi_

intro.para: Is the name of the governing scalable predicate register P0-P7, encoded in the "Pg" field.

explanation.enclist: cmpeq_p_p_zi_, cmpge_p_p_zi_, cmpgt_p_p_zi_, cmphi_p_p_zi_, cmphs_p_p_zi_, cmple_p_p_zi_, cmplo_p_p_zi_, cmpls_p_p_zi_, cmplt_p_p_zi_, cmpne_p_p_zi_

intro.para: Is the name of the source scalable vector register, encoded in the "Zn" field.

explanation.enclist: cmpeq_p_p_zi_, cmpge_p_p_zi_, cmpgt_p_p_zi_, cmple_p_p_zi_, cmplt_p_p_zi_, cmpne_p_p_zi_

intro.para: For the equal, greater than, greater than or equal, less than, less than or equal and not equal variant: is the signed immediate operand, in the range -16 to 15, encoded in the "imm5" field.
For the higher, higher or same, lower and lower or same variant: is the unsigned immediate operand, in the range 0 to 127, encoded in the "imm7" field.

ps.name: CMPEQ-P.P.ZI-_
